allowedTag.description: Stores the tag keyword and the shop it is associated with.

shopifyProduct.description: In-sync with product data from your installed stores.

shopifyShop.description: Keeps track of Shopify shops that your app has been installed on.

create.description: Creates a shopifyProduct and calls applyTags() defined in shopifyProduct/utils.js.

update.description: Updates a shopifyProduct and calls applyTags() defined in shopifyProduct/utils.js.

utils.js.description: applyTags(): Matches saved keywords against product descriptions, and then updates the products in Shopify with any matching tags.

allowedTag.description: shopify-app-users have been given permission to create, find, update and delete allowedTag. This means you can add allowedTags from the authenticated admin view.

allowedTag/filters/tenancy.gelly.description: has been added so that merchants are only able to read tags for their store.

App.jsx.description: This page handles routing of the frontend pages.

ShopPage.jsx.description: Displayed in the dashboard, shopify admins can add and remove keywords from your app's database.
